parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID in the workers search.

parameters.name: fleetIds
parameters.description: The fleet ID of the workers to search for. (string) ---

parameters.name: filterExpressions
parameters.description: The filter expression, AND or OR, to use when searching among a group of search strings in a resource. You can use two groupings per search each within parenthesis (). The filters to use for the search. (dict) --- The type of search filter to apply. dateTimeFilter (dict) --- Filters based on date and time. The name of the date-time field to filter on. The type of comparison to use to filter the results. The date and time. parameterFilter (dict) --- Filters by parameter. The name of the parameter to filter on. The type of comparison to use to filter results. The parameter's value. searchTermFilter (dict) --- Filters by a specified search term. The term to search for. matchType (string) --- Specifies how Deadline Cloud matches your search term in the results. If you don't specify a matchType the default is FUZZY_MATCH. FUZZY_MATCH - Matches if a portion of the search term is found in the result. CONTAINS - Matches if the exact search term is contained in the result. stringFilter (dict) --- Filters by a string. The field name to search. The type of comparison to use for this search. The string to search for. groupFilter (dict) --- Filters by group. The operators to include in the search.

parameters.description: The search terms for a resource. (dict) --- The resources to search. userJobsFirst (dict) --- Options for sorting a particular user's jobs first. The user's ID. fieldSort (dict) --- Options for sorting by a field. The sort order for the field. The name of the field. parameterSort (dict) --- Options for sorting by a parameter. The sort order for the parameter. The parameter name to sort by.
